resources.string:
Controls: - Drag the pointer (mouse or touch) from the slingshot to launch the penguins. - Drag the pointer (mouse or touch) from anywhere else or use the Up / Left / Down / Right or W / A / S / D keys to pan the viewport. - Use the two-finger pinch gesture, the mouse wheel, or the ] / [ keys to zoom in / out.
